Alteration 3

Inner Sun
Ritual
F1S1
spell id [id]: 621
effect number [effect_number]: 23
damage [damage]: 67108864
spec [spec]: 8929280
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 1F
Bless/Buff: Inner Sun
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This spell provides a mage a way to retaliate when attacked by undead warriors. When the mage is slain, a shower of light will shoot forth from the body and burn all undead beings in the vicinity. The Inner Sun spell is a ritual and will last until the mage is killed.
Explosion: 15 AN MR dmg (undeads and demons only), 35 AoE
